SEARCH
Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.rabbitmq

Class RabbitMQConsumer

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.rabbitmq.RabbitMQConsumer
@Service public class RabbitMQConsumer extends Object
RabbitMQ message consumer for handling various event-driven tasks.

This class listens to a specified RabbitMQ queue and processes incoming messages, performing actions such as sending emails for registration verification, appointment notifications, and password resets.

  • Method Details

    • receiveMessage

      @RabbitListener(queues="registration-queue") public void receiveMessage(String message)
      Processes incoming messages from the RabbitMQ queue.

      The method parses the message and determines the action to perform based on the event type. Supported events include:

      • RegistrationCompleteEvent
      • AppointmentBookedEvent
      • AppointmentCanceledEvent
      • AppointmentApprovedEvent
      • AppointmentDeclinedEvent
      • PasswordResetEvent
      Parameters:
      message - The message received from the queue.

    • sendRegistrationVerificationEmail

      private void sendRegistrationVerificationEmail(String data) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Sends a registration verification email to the user.
      Parameters:
      data - The ID of the user to whom the email will be sent.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - If an error occurs while sending the email.
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If the email encoding is unsupported.

    • sendAppointmentBookedNotification

      private void sendAppointmentBookedNotification(String data) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Sends a notification to the veterinarian about a booked appointment.
      Parameters:
      data - The ID of the veterinarian.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - If an error occurs while sending the email.
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If the email encoding is unsupported.

    • sendAppointmentCanceledNotification

      private void sendAppointmentCanceledNotification(String data) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Sends a notification to the veterinarian about a canceled appointment.
      Parameters:
      data - The ID of the veterinarian and appointment number.
